actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend titles 10 and 32, United States Code, to authorize additional medical and dental care and other related benefits for reservists and members of the National Guard, under certain conditions.

summary.text: Reserve Forces Benefits Act - Authorizes the same medical, dental, and hospital benefits which are now available to members of the Uniformed Services to reservists and members of the National Guard when such illness was incurred or aggravated incident to duty or training. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1076; Adds U.S.C. 1088)

titles.title: A bill to amend titles 10 and 32, United States Code, to authorize additional medical and dental care and other related benefits for reservists and members of the National Guard, under certain conditions.
